snippet.title: Runion - iPad party game for 8 players
snippet.description:
Runion is a fun 2D iPad party game for up to 8 simultaneous players developed by indie game developers from Latvia. Characters can be controlled with remote iPhone controllers or controllers located in the corners of iPad. Runion features 3 party game modes (bomb opponents' asses, capture the flag and collect coins) and a single-player campaign in which you have to fight against evil onions. The amazing 2D art, FX and other stuff is hand drawn.

Available on AppStore: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/runion/id932656771
Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/runiongame
Visit our facebook page: http://facebook.com/runiongame
